column3: This lonesome lass needs an adventurer with courage.
Survey the designated location and slay the stray gazelle for its horn.
Deliver the gazelle horn to the lonesome lass.
By the look of those strange garments, I take it you're an adventurer? If you've a little time to spare, I could sure use your help.

I was hoping to make a charm for a friend of mine, and I desperately need the horn of a gazelle. They're not easy to come by here in Ala Ghiri, and I could never hunt one on my own. For an adventurer like yourself, I bet it'd be as easy as kicking rocks.
Normally you'd need to travel pretty far to even find a gazelle, but I've heard a stray was spotted near Miriam's Luck.
I don't have much, but I'll gladly pay you for its horns if you can find it.
The officers said they spotted a gazelle near Miriam's luck. I pray it's still there.
Was it true? Was there really a gazelle up there?
Oh, this is wonderful. Thank you! She's going to love the charm I make with this.
They say the horns of the gazelle are a symbol of strength, you know. She'll need it where she's headed.
With Ala Ghiri finally liberated from the Garleans, she intends to move to Ul'dah and start a business.
I could never do something so bold. After everything we've been through, the world seems like such a scary place. If fate should curse me to be taken by the Garleans again, I'd...I'd...
Never mind me. She's always been the brave one, and I know she'll be fine. Still, I'll feel better knowing she has my charm with her.
